prompts: Create an electric-type Pokemon with bright green fur and sharp yellow accents.
Imagine a Pokemon that has the agility of a cat and the energy of a lightning bolt.
Show me a Pokemon that thrives in forests and has a playful personality.
Design a small, quadruped Pokemon with electric powers and a sleek, agile body.
Generate a Pokemon that looks like a miniature dinosaur but can summon thunderstorms.
Make a creature that blends seamlessly into grasslands, with vibrant colors and a lively demeanor.
Give me an electric-type Pokemon that can outrun its opponents with incredible speed.

distinctive_features: Tail shaped like a lightning bolt
Bright yellow stripe on the back
